utterances: ...who I would vote for for president.
He was a fickle guy, wasn't he?
He was a fickle guy, wasn't he?
He backed Perot for a while, then he switched over to - I can't remember who it was then, you know, Clinton.
And, you know, he was all over, that space alien.
I assume that's what you're talking about.
Well, what am I going to do now, though?
Have the aliens migrated online, perhaps?
You know, I really don't know what.
I haven't been involved with Weekly World News in probably - well, I don't know, let me count the ways -probably eight years or so, you know...
Keep on making endorsements so I know what to do with the next election, because - now that I'm lost.
Somebody will pick up the slack.
Thanks very much for the call, Peter.
Let's see if we can go now to - this is Laura?
Laura is with us from Grants Pass in Oregon.
I was just telling your screener that that's one of our favorite things to do in the post office when we're sorting mail, is to share the headlines with each other.
And it will be sorely missed.
I'm sorry your day will be a little less filled with laughter.
And news, and important current events.
I just want to share basically what I consider the greatest headline of all time.

It takes a little setup, though, because it's based on two previous stories in the Weekly World News - one about the shaved ape baby and the other about Saddam Hussein and Osama bin laden being gay and getting married - and that is, basically, Saddam Hussein and Osama bin Laden adopt shaved ape baby.
And that's the only time I've ever bought a - one of the tabloids.
But I bought it for that cover.
It's the greatest headline I've ever seen.
You're richer for it, I might add.
Let's talk with Jean(ph), Jean from Cape Cod in Massachusetts.
I just want to say - well, first of all, it's great to know that people were really making them up and they weren't serious.
It was always hard to tell because you always had a lot of people that kind of looked vaguely alike but with different mustaches and beards on that were experts.
My favorite story - and I actually saved this one - was aliens molested my weed whacker and raped my electric broom.
I guess that was one of the true ones.
I was like, man, I'm sorry it's going belly-up because it was so much fun, and it didn't put anybody else down.
It just - it was just fun.
And thank you for all the funny...
